The Star of the Dúnedain was a silver br: The Dúnedain Rangers who came to Aragorn at Dunharrow wore these on their clothing
shaped like a many-rayed star: specifically to fasten their cloaks on their left shoulder. It served as part of their identity
and the only ornamentation the Rangers ever wore in their journeys. The Star was also considered a badge of honor
column4: and after the events of the War of the Ring
column5: in  Aragorn gave this insignia to Samwise Gamgee
